rooms.description: Vastu-aligned main entrance to welcome positive energy. Large windows on south and east for natural light.
Open space with ample natural ventilation. Windows on north and east sides as per Vastu guidelines. Adjacent to the dining area.
Connected seamlessly with living room; designed for family gatherings. Includes sliding glass doors leading to garden.
Compact yet functional kitchen with a service area. Ventilation openings on east and north sides as per Vastu norms.
Small utility room for guests; located near the entrance to maintain privacy.
Two-car garage with easy access from the driveway. Features ventilation openings.

openings.description: Large door with glass accents for natural light.
Large windows ensuring ample daylight and cross ventilation.
Sliding doors that open to the garden, promoting an indoor-outdoor flow.
Ventilation system installed for airflow in garage space.
